ModMetaData.name: Cyanobot's Genes
ModMetaData.author: cyanobot
ModMetaData.description:
7 new xenotypes and 47 new genes (16 cosmetic, 31 functional) to add to your gene pool. Requires Biotech.
Genes: - 3 templates that generate genes dynamically from loaded xenotypes --- Offspring: carriers have offspring of a different xenotype to themselves --- Metamorphosis: carriers transform into a different xenotype at adulthood --- Implanter: carriers can implant a specific xenotype into others (not necessarily their own) - 2 hemogen-powered abilities - Bodyfeeder gene for getting hemogen primarily from human flesh - 5 diet genes: herbivores, carnivores, and obligate cannibals - more/less/no Recreation need - mental break threshold raised/lowered - 3 body size genes - 3 aging genes - Precocious gene that allows infants to take care of themselves from birth - genetic blindness/mutism - 7 trait-forcing genes including 2 new traits - claws, fangs, and tough skin - 14 more miscellaneous - head frills, tusks, and nostril slits - tabby-patterned fur - 2 tails - 2 blood colors, 3 eye colors, 1 alternative eye graphic - 3 hair bundles containing 17 hair colors - 3 skin bundles containing 17 skin colors
Xenotypes: - Biodrone : Emotionally dampened supersoldiers. Not quite as potent as Hussars, but far more controllable. Stoic and resilient, but inept at most non combat tasks. - Changeling : Beautiful, flighty children found mysteriously without parents. They eat a lot, sleep a lot, and donâ€™t work hard, but everyone loves them. - Fairy : The ironically named adult form of the changeling. Hulking, highly aggressive brutes with toxic spittle and great strength and speed. - Glimmer (requires Outland - Genetics) : Hopelessly lost glitterworlders unsuited for life on the Rim. Intelligent, cheerful, intensely sociable, clumsy, herbivorous, and extremely distressed by violence. - Kitlin : Useless cat people who spend all their time sleeping or playing. They are quick and agile and have a knack for shooting. - Psycrux (requires VRE - Archon) : Intensely powerful psycasters and psychic parasites, able to implant others with a Thrall xenogerm to more readily enslave them and feed on their psyches. - Thrall (requires VRE - Archon) : Created by Psycrux, thralls are easily controlled. They work most hours of the day, needing no recreation and little sleep, but they are slow in everything they do. - Shulk : Highly specialised pioneers for settling remote cave systems. Self-sufficient with natural weapons for hunting, tough skin, strong immune systems and the ability to eat pretty much anything, but mute and extremely light sensitive. - Wist : Hemogen-powered battlefield medics who use bloodfeeding to power coagulation and a potent, addictive, venomous bite that dulls pain, fights infection, and elevates mood.
